attributes.description:
The KIA Sportage is a wonderful SUV, with near perfect proportions, gorgeous aesthetic appeal and a sublime drive. The Sportage is large enough to accommodate a family of five, and small enough to whizz around town. As with all KIA's of late, the quality of the fit and finish is simply superb. This vehicle will make for an awesome addition to any family.

Balance of KIA's 5 year / unlimited mileage warranty and 5 year / 90'000km service plan.

Don't miss out. Call us now, or leave your details and we will be sure to call you.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome, Full Service History.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs. E&OE

As one of the many Motus Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority!

MOTUS: Live, Love, Drive.

attributes.description: At KIA Diepriver we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre-Owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and a quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA Diep River Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit your needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our Dealership.

We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. attributes.description:
Volkswagen Polo Playa / Polo Polo 1.0 Tsi Trendline
Stunning Polo in silver and in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, aircon, airbags, radio with bluetooth and USB ports to charge your phone. Power steering, electric windows. Manual transmission, great fuel consumption and gives a comfortable drive throughout town. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this VW for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.
